sections.Biography:
===Background===
Lady Talia was the mother of Elissa, Malcolm, and several other children. She passed away during or after [[Robert's Rebellion]].

==="[[Iron From Ice]]"===
In the codex, it's mentioned that Elissa named herÂ second born daughter, [[Talia Forrester|Talia]], after her own mother.Â
